summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of Sunset Avenue from West Holgate Street to the northerly line of lot 22, block 26, replat of West Seattle Park, by constructing watermains and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 8410 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
